item.title: [GROOVY-2133] Static imports not working inside closures
item.description:
It looks like static imports don't work inside closures:

Groovy Shell (1.1-beta-3, JVM: 1.6.0_02-b06)
Type 'help' or '\h' for help.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
groovy:(0):000> import static java.lang.Math.*
groovy:(0):000> random()
001> random()
===> 0.35025511331429426

item.summary: Static imports not working inside closures

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Ok, I added support for static import resolution for ExpressionStatements within Closures consisting of BlockStatements. Can you think of any other cases we need to deal with?

I can't really think of other cases, since I believe you've covered them: inside a script, inside a class (in a constructor, in a method, in a static method, in a static initializer), inside a closure, inside a double nested closure... Well, I guess that's all.
Thanks a lot for the fix!
Don't hesitate to close it once you feel your tests cover those cases.
